General Principles

Introduction

This website serves two purposes

  1. To document standard styles and patterns established by the Undergraduate Studies Boilerplate, which is used for most Undergraduate Studies projects. These styles and patterns are designed to adhere to the Mizzou Identity Standards.
  2. To document important goals and strategies used in the building of Undergraduate Studies websites.

Nullam quis risus eget .class-example urna mollis ornare vel eu leo.

Markup
<div class="button-example button-example--dark">
    <p><a href="http://undergraduatestudies.missouri.edu" class="button--dark-brown--large">Brown Button</a></p>
    <p><a href="http://undergraduatestudies.missouri.edu" class="button--dark-gold--large">Gold Button</a></p>
    <p><a href="http://undergraduatestudies.missouri.edu" class="button--dark-grey--large">Grey Button</a></p>
</div>

SASS CSS
.button--dark-brown--large
{
    @include button(
        $size: 'large',
        $color: 'brown',
        $theme: 'dark'
    );
}

.button--dark-gold--large
{
    @include button(
        $size: 'large',
        $color: 'gold',
        $theme: 'dark'
    );
}

.button--dark-grey--large
{
    @include button(
        $size: 'large',
        $color: 'grey',
        $theme: 'dark'
    );
}
